author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sinopec Oilfield Service ‍Updates On Unusual Price Movements In A Shares Trading​
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Sinopec Oilfield Service Corp:
* ‍UPDATES ON UNUSUAL PRICE MOVEMENTS IN A SHARES TRADING​ * ‍CONFIRMS THAT CURRENT PRODUCTIONS AND OPERATIONS OF COMPANY AND ITS CONTROLLED SUBSIDIARIES ARE RUNNING SMOOTHLY​
* ‍NO MAJOR CHANGES MADE IN MARKET ENVIRONMENT OR INDUSTRY POLICY & INTERNAL PRODUCTION & OPERATION ORDER OF CO IS NORMAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
